description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=2/3. Adrift is an arcade style action oriented 3d game. Players control boats loaded with weapons and command a squad of ai assisted boats. The campaign tells the story of a young Somali pirate's climb through the ranks of a deadly pirate organization based in the Gulf of Aden. Invite your friends to join you in co-op story play or fun packed party mode.
